javadoc: An abstract class that each RTTI data type should extend to get common functionality.

methods.name: isValid
methods.comment: Determines if the data type is valid for placing at the indicated address in the program.

params.name: overwriteInstructions
params.comment:
true indicates that existing instructions can be overwritten 
 by this data type.

params.name: overwriteDefinedData
params.comment:
true indicates that existing defined data can be overwritten 
 by this data type.

return.comment: true if this data type can be laid down at the specified address.

methods.name: isValid
methods.comment: Determines if the data type is valid for placing at the indicated address in the program.

params.name: address
params.comment: the address where the validated data type will be used to create data

params.name: validationOptions
params.comment: options indicating how to perform the validation

return.comment: true if this data type can be laid down at the specified address

name: RTTIDataType
comment: An abstract class that each RTTI data type should extend to get common functionality.
